definition: autumn ripples/(fig.) luminous eyes of a woman/amorous glance
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
to cast flirtatious glances at sb (idiom)
to cast flirtatious glances at sb (idiom)

sentences.english: She has made so many passes at me recently that I think it necessary to freeze her off.
sentences.chinese: 最近她多次向我拋送秋波，我覺得有必要疏遠她。

sentences.english: The lovers were making sheep's eyes at each other over the table.
sentences.chinese: 那對戀人隔著桌子互送秋波。

sentences.english: Lisa's young colleague made passes at her every time he met her.
sentences.chinese: 麗薩的年輕同事每次見到她就給她暗送秋波。

sentences.english: She makes eyes at all handsome men.
sentences.chinese: 她對所有英俊的男士大送秋波。

sentences.english: He makes a pass at every girl he meets.
sentences.chinese: 他對每一個他遇到的女孩都暗送秋波。

sentences.english: In other words, shemaymight try to make eyes at him or give him the eye.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，她試着給他遞眼色或暗送秋波。

sentences.english: In the meantime, Ford may be getting interest from several Chinese car companies.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，中國汽車廠商對福特的秋波則綿綿不斷。

sentences.english: That guy is making passes at Janet.
sentences.chinese: 那個傢伙在向珍妮特暗送秋波。

sentences.english: Drunk in a dream, and rain, are waking troubles.
sentences.chinese: 醉裏秋波，夢中朝雨，都是醒時煩惱。

sentences.english: At the first sight Paul and Anna changed eyes.
sentences.chinese: 保羅和安娜初次見面就互送秋波。

sentences.english: Did you note that she made eyes at you?
sentences.chinese: 你注意到沒？她在向你暗送秋波。

sentences.english: Betty was making sheep 's eyes at Eddy.
sentences.chinese: 貝蒂正向埃迪暗送秋波。

sentences.english: She makes eye at every attractive man who comes to the office.
sentences.chinese: 她向來辦公室的每個美男子送秋波。

sentences.english: She kept rolling her eyes at the young man.
sentences.chinese: 她不斷向那個小夥子傳送秋波。

sentences.english: Shoot shoot wind swaying branches, life helpless, Ying season, tachycardia with her.
sentences.chinese: 風梢梢的枝頭，搖曳人生無奈，富盈一季，速伴秋波。

sentences.english: The lady of the house gave me the glad eye.
sentences.chinese: 屋中的女孩朝我送秋波。

definition: limpid autumn waters (trad. description of girl's beautiful eyes)
(literary) (of a woman) to have a graceful demeanor/beautiful woman
to have bright eyes and white teeth
